interestingcomments.content:
Silicon Valley AI field /!/ I am looking to push toward a different career field. I am a complete noob to the AI world. The Silicon Valley is in my backyard and with the advancements in AI, I am becoming intrigued. I believe there is plenty of opportunity where I am located, but where do I start? 

Do I need to get a Bachelor’s or masters in this field to be considered a viable applicant? If so, what schools should I be applying to? Please enlighten me. Thank you!
